Snow Globe in Three.js

Feeling a bit out of the Christmas spirit? That's okay! This snow globe, created from scratch in three.js, will lift your mood. It even plays music and generates snow! Can you believe it?

This small project is a demonstration of my skills in computer graphics and three.js in particular.

In this project, my main focus was to create a realistic glass sphere for the snow globe as well as background scene to create Christmas atmosphere.

Role

Programmer

Year

2024

Tools/Technology

Three.js

Collaborators
